00005 /* This exits if there is a read problem */
00006 void read_eek(const char *EEK, const char *fdesc){
00007 printf("Unexpected %s during read of file: %s\n",EEK,fdesc);
00008 printf("Exiting.\n");
00009 exit(1);
00010 return;
00011 }
